author: القدس العربي
title: Ground News - In conjunction with the war on Gaza.. Mohammed Assaf releases a new song for Palestine
text:
Summary by القدس العربي “Al-Quds al-Arabi”: Mohammad Assaf's new song has received widespread praise after his expression of the Palestinians' commitment to staying in their land despite death and destruction. The Palestinian artist posted his song on his social media accounts and generated a large number of views during the early hours of its broadcast. The song “I'll Die Free” comes in light of the Israeli war on the Gaza Strip, which resulted in the death of [...] Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
